message.name: ERR_INTAKEWITHDRAWAL_FV_WITHDRAWAL_DATE_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: The Withdrawal Date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_INTAKEWITHDRAWAL_FV_WITHDRAWAL_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_APPLICATION_DATE
message.locale: The Withdrawal Date must not be earlier than the Application Date. The Application Date is %1d.

message.name: ERR_INTAKEWITHDRAWAL_FV_WITHDRAWAL_DATE_LATER_THAN_TODAY
message.locale: The Withdrawal date must not be later than today.

message.name: ERR_INTAKEWITHDRAWAL_FV_WITHDRAWAL_METHOD_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: The Withdrawal Method must be entered.

message.name: ERR_INTAKEWITHDRAWAL_FV_WITHDRAWAL_REASON_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: The Withdrawal Reason must be entered.

message.name: ERR_INTAKEWITHDRAWAL_FV_FIRST_NAME_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: The First Name of the Signature must be entered.

message.name: ERR_INTAKEWITHDRAWAL_FV_LAST_NAME_NOT_ENTERED
message.locale: The Last Name of the Signature must be entered.

message.name: ERR_INTAKEWITHDRAWAL_XFV_DESCRIPTION_REQUIRED_IF_OTHER_SELECTED
message.locale: A description must be entered if "Other" reason has been selected.

message.name: ERR_INTAKEWITHDRAWAL_XRV_OPEN_PRODUCT_DELIVERIES_EXIST_FOR_PROGRAM
message.locale: One or more product deliveries for %1s exist. Please close the related product deliveries before withdrawing the program from the application.

message.name: ERR_INTAKEWITHDRAWAL_REQUEST_ALREADY_CONFIRMED
message.locale: This withdrawal request has already be confirmed.

message.name: INF_INTAKE_WITHDRAWAL_APPLICATION_RECEIVED
message.locale: Online Withdrawal Request for %1s has been submitted for %2s Application %3s for %4s.

message.name: ERR_INTAKEWITHDRAWAL_OPEN_REQUEST_ALREADY_CONFIRMED
message.locale: An Online Withdrawal Request already exists for this Program Application.
